triples.name: Statistical machine translation
triples.relevance: The paper builds on phrase-based statistical machine translation systems to estimate translation model probabilities.

triples.name: Neural network
triples.relevance: The paper uses neural networks as the core approach to learn translation probabilities for phrase pairs.

triples.name: Word embedding
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using continuous representations (word embeddings) to represent phrase pairs for translation probability estimation.

triples.name: Machine translation
triples.relevance: Machine translation is the overarching task being addressed by the phrase-based statistical translation system.

triples.name: Moses (machine translation)
triples.relevance: The paper discusses integration of their approach into the Moses statistical machine translation decoder.

triples.name: BLEU
triples.relevance: The paper uses BLEU score to evaluate and show improvements in machine translation quality.
